thread.title: Gail

author: Gail
title: Gail
text: I purchased the Bevel small bookcase and the Tokyo console table last autumn. Both pieces are solid wood, beautiful polished and sturdy. Free delivery and white glove treatment are bonuses. My only concern was assembling the console table. Joining the legs to the top proved challenging to tighten the bolts. Other than that, I am pleased with the quality and appearance of the furniture.
